name: Soul Graph
description: Soulgraph is building open source tools & providing infrastructure for developers to give their agents a rich & evolving personality, user bound persistent memory, and real time voice to voice communication. Soulgraph is the shared infrastructure to be used by agents deployed with ElizaOS, Zerepy, Arc, and any future agentic frameworks. Soulgraph makes agents become memorable characters - the kind you want to interact with again and again.
